name: Blowtrasher
description:
The game was made by me, a 13 year old gamedev, for the 6th Brackeys Game Jam in a week.

Blow all the bits of paper into the trash can using the blower.

Controls:
Movement: W, A, S, D
Space to turn on/off blower
Hold down left mouse button and move cursor or use the arrow keys to rotate the blower
